text.summary: On August 19, 1975, Bill writes a letter to Hannah, where he describes his stay at his friend's villa in Mallorca, details a conversation about war and politics with a Spanish prince at the villa, compares financial life in New York to London, updates her on his illness, tells her the books he is reading and editing, and asks how she is and how her manuscript has progressed.
